original_text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick, he abode two days still in the same place where he was.
korean_text: 나사로가 병들었다 함을 들으시고 그 계시던 곳에 이틀을 더 유하시고

sentences.original_text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그가 병들었다는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: in the same place where he was
